data.question: What is the chemical formula for the complex [ClO4⊂Fe-1']?
What type of radiation was used for the X-ray diffraction of [ClO4⊂Fe-1']?
What is the space group of the crystal structure [Cl(BF4)5⊂Co-2]?
What method was used to grow crystals of [ClO4⊂Fe-2]?
data.answer: Slow diffusion of diethyl ether into an acetonitrile solution

data.question: What is the maximum number of volume-refinement cycles used in VOIDOO calculations?
What was the crystal size of [Cl(ClO4)5⊂Ni-2]?
Is the structure of [Cl(ClO4)5⊂Ni-2] racemically twinned?
What was the temperature used for the X-ray diffraction of [MeCN⊂Ni-1]?
Did the crystals of [OTf⊂Ni-4] display poor diffraction properties?
What was the method used for empirical absorption corrections in the X-ray diffraction data?
What was the crystal habit of [Zn-5]?
What software was used for data integration and reduction of X-ray diffraction data?
data.answer: HKL Denzo and Scalepack, CrysAlisPro, or CrystalClear

data.question: Was SQUEEZE function of PLATON used in the refinement of [ClO4⊂Fe-1']?
What was the primary grid spacing used in VOIDOO calculations?
What was the crystal color of [Cl(ClO4)5⊂Ni-2]?
What was the GoF (goodness of fit) for the refinement of [Cl(BF4)5⊂Co-2]?
Was the structure of [ClO4⊂Fe-2] determined to be racemically twinned?
data.answer: No, it was [Cl(ClO4)5⊂Fe-2] that was racemically twinned.
